Title: The Worst Kind of Hunter
Writer: Craig Johnson (book), Hunt Baldwin (developed for television by), John Coveny (developed for television by), Hunt Baldwin, John Coveny
Actors: Robert Taylor, Katee Sackhoff, Lou Diamond Phillips, Bailey Chase
Plot: A paroled killer is mauled by a bear, but Longmire suspects that there is more to the story. Meanwhile, Branch's uncle creates havoc for the sheriff's department.
